verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu mane vicāra kariyā
cāri sampradāya dila gāyana bāṅṭiyā

synonyms: tabe—after this; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mane—in the mind; vicāra kariyā—considering; cāri sampradāya—four parties; dila—gave; gāyana bāṅṭiyā—dividing the singers.
translation: When the four parties were formed, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, after some consideration, divided the chanters.
